Description:
Solid Family Home - Central Location
With close proximity to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and only walking distance to Heyers Rd Shops, local Medical Centre, Grovedale West Primary and Secondary College, here is a great opportunity for investors or first home buyers to get into the market with a very smart three bedroom home on a 576m2 allotment.
The rendered façade is a nice touch to the exterior while internally updates throughout make the house a "walk into no work required" affair. The master bedroom features a double vanity ensuite and walk in robe. Subway tiles compliment the kitchen area with dishwasher and wide cavity for a large refrigerator/freezer. A free standing white tub is a nice feature of the main bathroom. The living and dining areas sit adjacent with stylish "cutaways" in the original passage way wall opening up the floor plan and giving a sense of space and ease of communication with people in the kitchen. A wall unit cooler in the living room takes care of the temperature in summer months while ducted heating channels throughout.
Outside is a large deck area perfect for entertaining while the pond feature gives a tranquil touch. The rear yard further to the back would be perfect for a pet with the added safety fence. Don't miss out!
Insights: 10 Patonga Crescent, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Prestige, Position And Panoramic Views
Perched on the hill overlooking the picturesque Barwon River this huge block of land presents a unique opportunity to secure an allotment in this tightly held and prestigious locale. In fact, this is the only vacant block in this exclusive and quiet cul-de-sac.
Located high above the Barwon River with walking and cycling tracks below, the view is breathtaking with the block situated on the bend of the river and the vista of Newtown beyond. Just minutes from the Highton Shopping Centre and medical and sporting facilities, this is a prized parcel of land. The absence of passing traffic affords a relaxed and peaceful atmosphere allowing you to sit back and enjoy the ambience.
The 1145sqm block boasts generous proportions featuring a long northern boundary, ideal for contemporary light filled architecture and also a large frontage, allowing for indoor-outdoor living zones and taking full advantage of the views. Build your dream home (STCA) on this blank canvas of land that has not been made available for almost 30 years. With an array of private and public schools within easy reach, and the ring road to Melbourne and the Surf Coast accessible within minutes, this is truly a wonderful part of Geelong to live.

Description:
Country style living - Ideal First Home, Investment or Downsizer!
Looking for low-maintenance living but still need room to store a caravan or boat and the addition of a workshop - then this is the home for you!
Presenting a fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, investors, and downsizers alike, you'll need to act quickly to secure this Leopold gem!
Tucked away in a peaceful pocket, you'll love that this location still places life's conveniences within easy reach. This solid brick 3 bedroom home is located on a generous 679SQM corner allotment. Ready to be moved in and enjoyed step inside to a large open family room with separate dining. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a large built-in pantry, dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, and rangehood. The generous open kitchen/dining zone flows out onto the fantastic outdoor alfresco area - creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for everyday living and hosting loved ones.
The Master Bedroom features a Built-in robe and Ensuite. Two additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes, with the third bedroom offering versatility as a study or home office. The bathroom is graced with a large shower, bathtub, and single vanity with separate toilet and a large laundry has access outside, with an abundance of storage throughout this cleverly designed home.
You'll be in comfort all year long thanks to the open fire place, gas wall heater and ceiling fans. Extra inclusions include a 3KW Solar power system and a near new Gas Hot water system.
Easy care gardens surround the home, with established vegetable gardens and fruit trees. The remote double lock-up car-port has access straight through to a large 6x9 metre shed,a secure trailor port and an additional garden shed with access through to the back yard.
The Gateway Plaza is conveniently close by for your shopping and dining needs, while the nearby Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds will delight fitness enthusiasts. Young families will appreciate easy access to the Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub. Public transport is moments away, while superior access to the Portarlington Highway makes traveling to Geelong or the Bellarine Peninsula a breeze.
Low-maintenance living with a few extra perks, this home will impress! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 25 Claremont Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Two Bedroom Unit -Perfect Position!
This low maintenance two bedroom unit is located approximately 800 metres from the Gateway Plaza and Gateway Sanctuary. Set back from the street front, this low maintenance unit features open plan living, dining and kitchen opening onto the rear alfresco entertaining area perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing with friends. The kitchen is well equipped with freestanding stove, corner pantry and ample bench and cupboard space. Two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom with bath, shower and vanity, separate toilet and laundry. Split system ensures your heating and cooling comfort year round. Single car garage with internal access.

Description:
Beautiful family home in a great location.
Situated on 978m2, in a highly desirable pocket of Leopold, and surrounded in meticulously manicured gardens, this spacious and delightful home is perfect for those who settle for nothing less than perfection. This classically styled, red brick residence stands proud in an elevated position to capture pristine views over Geelong, while being close to the shops, walking distance to the Leopold sportsman's club and just a 15 minute drive to Geelong.
Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, formal and informal living, and a private and secure backyard, this property is sure to appeal to those searching for space, quality, and privacy. The quality and craftsmanship of this home stand out as soon as you set foot in this charming home. From the beautiful slate flooring to the decorative timber beadboard and high ceilings throughout, it's hard to fault the heart and soul that has gone into the design and build of this remarkable abode.
At the heart of the home, the opulent formal living area welcomes guests on entry and features decorative light fittings, and a stunning exposed brick wall with central wood fire - certainly one of the most spacious living rooms on offer in Leopold.
The kitchen features quality blackwood cabinetry with plentiful storage, dishwasher, ceramic cooktop, and gas oven and overlooks the open plan living and dining area with feature timber ceilings and a beautiful outlook over the backyard. Through sliding doors, the beautiful alfresco area provides a great place to entertain or simply enjoy the views over Geelong while being encased with flourishing greenery in all directions.
Accommodation is well-appointed and features a luxurious main bedroom with walk-in robe, ceiling fan, and ensuite with spa bath. 2 more bedrooms offer large built-in robes and a large study located near the master bedroom could be the perfect nursery or 4th bedroom if desired. The lavish central bathroom offers a large shower, bath, and a separate toilet; great when entertaining guests.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning in the main living
- Central heating throughout
- Double garage with rear roller door access to the backyard
- Large hand-crafted garden shed
- Large laundry with great storage
- Ducted Vacuum
- 4.5kw PV Solar System
This exceptional property is located within walking or riding distance to the Bellarine Rail Trail and Leopold Sportsman's Club, just a short stroll to public transport, a 5-minute drive to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and all of its fine wineries, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!
Insights: 25 Highland Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Genuine Renovators Delight
Set in a family-friendly neighbourhood, this prime example of a fixer-upperer would serve as a fantastic family home with a bit of hard work and TLC.
Positioned on a sizeable allotment of approx. 604m2 and zoned Residential Growth Schedule 2, this property also lends itself to being developed further to capitalise upon views over Geelong, or into a 2-lot subdivision (STCA).
The home itself comprises;
4 good-sized bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite
2 x separate living zones, ideal for adults and kids entertainment
Enclosed alfresco/courtyard plus separate rear verandah
Double-length carport ideal for boats/caravans/trailers
Extras include; Gas wall heater, electric a/c unit, secure front gate
All your major amenities are conveniently located with the Dorothy Street shops, Leopold Primary School, Allanvale Pre School and public transport all within walking distance, with the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre a short drive away.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
HAVEN OF TRANQUILLITY
EXPRESSION OF INTEREST CLOSING THE 26TH JUNE @ 5PM
Effortlessly combining coastal charm with a peaceful ambience, this inviting seaside home set on a massive 1880 sqm (approx.) block is privately tucked away and located within walking distance to schools, park, reserves, beach, town centre and public transport.
Designed over two levels with an emphasis on entertaining year round, the property presents a seamless integration of indoor and outdoor living. The desirable layout includes cathedral ceilings, neutral colours, master suite with built in robes and full ensuite, three further bedrooms with two having built in robes, central main bathroom, two living zones and a separate dining area with built in bar. Add to this a large laundry with good storage and upstairs balcony highlighted by ocean views.
An abundance of north facing light is a feature of the property combined with split system heating/ cooling, gas log fire, two car garage plus workshop, shedding, carport and a delightful garden oasis of native flora and fruit trees surrounding the home. There is also the opportunity to further sub-divide the land STCA!
Built by Dennehy homes, this property provides the perfect opportunity for one lucky buyer to live the coastal dream with room to move in a sought after location.

Description:
RARE VACANT LAND - PRIME LOCATION!!
Situated in an elevated position of the Deep Creek Estate this fantastic sized 510m2 (approx.) vacant allotment presents a rare opportunity to purchase in a prime location. Comprising a substantial 17.5metre frontage, the site offers potential water views from a second storey dwelling and all services are available. A bike and walking path almost on the doorstep connect to both beaches, local primary and secondary schools, surf shops, cafes, and public transport close by. With easy access to the Surf Coast Highway, Deep Creek Estate is also around 20 minutes' drive to Geelong and Deakin University. This truly is a rarely found opportunity to purchase one of the best vacant allotments on the market today!! Call us for more information.

Description:
Flawless Combination of Scale & Size
This Property Is Private Inspection Only Call George 0407050471
Designed to accommodate even the largest of families with ease, this contemporary residence is the perfect retreat for the busy modern family. Situated around the corner from the local footy and netball club, the home enjoys a prime location walking distance to kid-friendly amenities including Clairvaux Primary School, Belmont High School, playgrounds, reserves and FoodWorks. Appreciating a prized, northerly aspect, the contemporary façade framed by landscaped gardens sets the tone of this sizeable home. Upon stepping inside, the home continues to impress showcasing multiple living spaces ensuring there's plenty of room for the family to spread out and relax. The stylish kitchen can easily cater to a crowd featuring a triple pantry and quality stainless steel appliances including a gas cooktop.
Positioned on the lower floor are 3 large bedrooms, 2 of which include walk-in robes for extra storage. Servicing the bedrooms is a renovated bathroom complete with shower, bath, twin sinks and a separate toilet. The master suite is a private sanctuary located on the upper level and features another deluxe ensuite, walk-in robe and a spacious retreat for parents to relax in peace and quiet. Perched on a large and level 650m2 block, the sun deck is an idyllic spot to fire up the barbeque for a casual dinner, while the kids (and pets!) wear themselves out running around in the fully fenced backyard. Other notable extras featured throughout include ducted heating and multiple split system cooling, study, internal laundry, under stair storage and a double lock-up garage with rear roller door access. The property is situated within proximity to major hubs including Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the thriving village precinct of High Street. The residence is also accessible to the highway and public transport making light work of your morning commute to Geelong. Do not delay your inspection of this modern masterpiece which showcases a flawless blend of scale and style. Call now to inspect today.

Description:
Opportunity Is Knocking In Belmont!
Set upon approx. 650m2, this property presents buyers with infinite possibilities! Whether you want to move straight in, renovate and extend into the north-facing backyard, or use the expansive land size for subdivision (STCA), this property is the one for you!
When it comes to family-friendly locations, this one has it all. A variety of schools are within easy walking distance, including Roslyn P.S, Belmont High School, Barwon Valley School, and Clairvaux Catholic School. The Stephen Street shops are also a short stroll away, along with the McDonald Reserve sporting grounds. With the charming Highton Village only moments away, a selection of cafes and shops are yours to enjoy whenever you please.
Still in original condition, the spotless interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to update with a contemporary touch (STCA). The generous lounge creates a peaceful setting while flowing through to the dining/kitchen zone. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, dishwasher, oven, electric cooktop, and range hood. Three bedrooms (each with built in robes and two with desks) are serviced by the bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry with storage completes the layout. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and refrigerated cooling.
An established grapevine drapes over the sheltered alfresco - putting the elements in place for casual outdoor living. Youll love kicking back under the shade as you watch the little ones play in the spacious backyard that soaks up the northern sunshine. Home to established gardens, including citrus and various other fruit trees, this outdoor retreat is perfect for fun family living. The remote single lock-up garage features a workbench, while the long driveway provides additional off-street parking.
Positioned in a Belmont hotspot, youll need to act swiftly to secure this potential-packed property! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 60 Pavo Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
The Family Lifestyle Youve Been Dreaming Of!
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace stylish family living on approx. 729m2! Featuring light-filled living zones, two north-facing alfresco decks, and a spacious backyard, theres something to delight everyone!
A convenient lifestyle is part of the package with the Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza just a short walk away. Public transport is also within easy walking distance, along with the Highview Estate Reserve. Montpellier P.S. is close by for families, while the Christian College Campuses and Newtowns private colleges are within easy reach. Buckley Falls and the Barwon River entice you to venture outdoors, while superior Ring Road access is ideal for Melbourne commuters.
The spacious floorplan creates a lovely sense of flow between indoors and outdoors, while also maximising the northern light. The front lounge provides a generous retreat for the whole family to enjoy, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with both of the alfresco decks. The kitchen will delight with ample storage, a glass splashback and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and 900mm SMEG oven/gas cooktop. The partly-sheltered deck inspires relaxation, while the sun-drenched deck is perfect for kicking back as you watch the kids play in the yard.
Parents will adore the generous Master Bedroom, which features a walk-in robe and en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with external access. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you in absolute comfort. Established trees line the landscaped backyard, creating a wonderful sense of privacy. The lawn provides a generous play space for children and pets, while the cubby house and sandpit are as cute as a button. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a double gate offers potential for side vehicle access.
Treat your family to the lifestyle youve been dreaming of! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 17 Nedlands Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Private setting convenience plus!
Absolutely perfect for the savvy first home buyer seeking maximum value where convenience is a must or the astute investor looking to tap into the consistent growth achieved in this pocket. Consisting of open plan lounge, meals and kitchen area with two generous bedrooms plus light filled bathroom. Features lock up garage, carport plus rear yard with north/west aspect. Well positioned within easy distance to public transport, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road. Major investment in the area including the ever expanding Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Waurn Ponds train station underpins your investment. Don't miss your opportunity, enquire today.

Description:
Expansive family living.
Situated on 675sqm (approx.) and in the heart of Highton's most sought after estate, located close to all amenities, this property is sure to tick the boxes. Comprising of three oversized bedrooms with well-appointed master suite, with a generous walk in robe and ensuite. Two other bedrooms are complemented with built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom. With two separate living spaces to enjoy, every member of the family is at ease with quiet hideaways to enjoy their favourite Netflix series.
With views across the South Barwon, outdoor entertaining is a breeze. The open plan living room leads out onto your very own balcony and undercover entertaining area to the left, which is perfect for hosting friends and family all year round whilst taking the gorgeous views. Head downstairs to the expansive laundry which also offers great storage with large cupboards or under the house, plus internal access to the remote double garage.
Extra features abound with central ducted heating, evaporative cooling, neat low-maintenance gardens and off street parking for a trailer/caravan or boat. Well positioned just minutes away from the Highton Village shopping precinct and the Geelong Ring Road, this location offers convenience with easy access to local schools and sporting facilities for the entire family.

Description:
A perfect, all-round entertainer!
Youll love:
This near-new, spacious & stylish home combines indoor/outdoor areas with a northerly aspect that make the most of the natural daylight all year round.
The modern open plan layout offers multiple low maintenance living options & includes a fantastic kitchen with a large butlers pantry.
The outdoor living space complete with its stylish undercover seating area, manicured lawn & solar heated swimming pool is extremely inviting & provides another great spot for entertaining.
The well-maintained, 593m2 corner allotment is located on a quiet street with a real neighbourly feel & very little through traffic.
Plus:
The master bedroom has 2 x WIRs plus a large ensuite with double vanities & a walk-in shower.
Bedroom 2 is spacious and includes a semi-ensuite & BIRs while bedrooms 3 & 4 are also generously-sized with BIRs.
Theres also a double garage with a handy storeroom/workshop attached, plus lots of other storage options throughout.
With so much to offer and located only a short distance to everything schools, shops, the beach & Torquay central itself this wonderful home is not to be missed!

Description:
RENT, RENOVATE OR DEVELOP
This charming 3 bed, 1 bath, 2 Living room weatherboard home set on a whopping 760 m2 block, presents so many options whether you want to Rent it for apx $400pw, renovate it into a family home or Develop (STCA).
Set in the heart of Belmont, walking distance to Highton Village and Roslyn Primary School, this spacious home comprises of
A large front master bedroom with original hardwood floors, BIR, blockout blinds and Bay window with a leafy front garden outlook.
A Front formal living room which can be closed off to the rest of the home is equipped with real fireplace, split AC system and ceiling fan for all year-round comfort, making it an ideal parents escape.
Down the hall you will find two additional carpeted bedrooms with BIR and a bright central bathroom with separate shower, vanity storage and a large corner spa bath.
The central kitchen has been tastefully updated in a modern grey colour palette and offers induction cooktop, wall oven and dishwasher plus ample overhead cupboards and flows nicely onto the dining space which can easily accommodate up to 8+.
Located at the rear of the home is a huge rumpus / games room ideal for kids to play in OR a space the whole family can come together and unwind. This room is fully tiled and is equipped with wall heater, AC Split system and offers a bright rear yard outlook.
Outside you will find spacious front & back yards, ideal for your four-legged friend or children to play in, plus an oversized DLUG and long driveway allowing for ample off-street parking.
FEATURES
• 2 Living rooms
• HEAT / AC
• 760 m2 Block apx
• Rent pw $400
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
A Hidden Gem In A Convenient Locale!
Sitting proudly on its own title, this property promises easy living on approx. 643m2! The kitchen, bathroom, and laundry have all been beautifully renovated within the last year. Plus, the north-facing backyard will delight those who are seeking low-maintenance living without compromising on outdoor space!
Convenient living doesnt get better than this with both Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Centre just a short walk from your front door. Public transport is also within easy walking distance, while the Gateway Plaza and Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds are moments away. Just jump in the car, and youll soon be in the heart of Geelong or exploring the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
Inside, the interiors are in immaculate condition. Both the lounge and living area unite with the dining/kitchen zone, creating a sense of flow throughout the lower level. With the lounge opening onto the wrap-around deck, youll love that you can enjoy a cup of tea while overlooking the backyard.
The kitchen exudes style with stone benchtops and a black glass splashback. The built-in pantry provides storage, while stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher, bar fridge, and Westinghouse oven, gas hob, rangehood.
The laundry and separate toilet complete the lower level.
Upstairs is home to three bedrooms (two with built-in robes, one with walk-in robe) and a stunning bathroom. Graced with a freestanding tub, open shower, dual vanity, and toilet, this space is the perfect pampering zone.
With two of the bedrooms boasting west-facing views, youll love soaking up the lights over Geelong at night.
Two split-system air conditioners and a ceiling fan provide modern comfort. The easy-care gardens leave you free to enjoy the more important things in life, while the fake timber deck is another low-maintenance feature.
The remote single lock-up garage boasts internal access, plus room for storage or a workshop. Off-street parking is also provided for an additional two vehicles.
Whether youre dreaming of owning your own home, searching for a great investment, or simply looking for easy living, this home will delight. Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 6A Arabando Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Rural Charm Close to Geelong CBD & Surf Coast
Offering closer proximity to the Geelong CBD than all the new developments further out off Barwon Head's Road and a country charm seldom found anymore is this gem in a hidden pocket of old Marshall. Situated on a generous 665m2 block with a fantastic flat rear yard for kids to play in this will make the perfect start for young couples wanting to start a family or even retirees who want a peaceful, laid back setting while still close to all important amenities.
The veranda on entrance and large wood fire box with internal chimney in the main living area all contribute to giving the house a warm and cosy feel. The three bedrooms at the rear of the property are spacious and all have built in robes. A nice extra feature is the second separate toilet as well as the one included in the updated main bathroom. The kitchen boasts a walk in pantry, plenty of bench space and dishwasher. A split system unit is also in the main living for even more heat and cooling in the summer months. Step outside to discover a fenced off zone on the western side which will make a haven for pets while children can play safely in the adjacent rear yard. A long double garage keeps vehicles safe and will cater for storage and possible workshop.
Shopping options are all available in nearby Belmont Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and Armstrong Creek while public transport is catered for in nearby Marshall Train Station. The Surf Coast, Deakin University and Ring Road are also close by. Don't wait for this rare slice of country pie close to Geelong CBD today!
Insights: 1 Tamala Avenue, Marshall VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 28 other 3 bedroom house in Marshall have recently been sold.

420m2 block located on Rosella Road in Stage 13 The Dunes, Torquay.
NBN and utility connections ready - Titled, ready to build now!
Schools, shops & sporting facilities all within arms reach.

Description:
Spacious family home in quiet court.
Tucked away in a quiet court in the heart of Grovedale this spacious family home is awaiting its new lucky owner.
The location itself boasting convenience just minutes to Waurn Ponds Shopping complex, 10 minutes to the Geelong CBD and within 20 minutes to Torquay. The home is tucked amongst an abundance of amenities and local schooling such as Grovedale Primary, Mandama Primary, Deakin University, Coles/IGA/ALDI, restaurants, retail shopping, Epworth Hospital and Marshall train station all within 10 minutes from your front door.
The home, sitting on a generous 698m2 approx. allotment with private and established gardens. Upon entry a seamless open floorplan awaits offering a formal lounge with open fire place and bright formal dining area, here you will also find the master bedroom, ensuite and walk in robe. Flowing through the central hall land in the modern kitchen and light filled second living area. This space flows effortlessly to the outdoor alfresco area and deck, perfect for entertaining all year round, reading a book in the sunshine or an evening glass of red. Furthermore to the rear of the home you will find 3 bedrooms with central main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Key Features:
698m2 approx.. allotment
Gas heater, open fire place, split system
Solar panels (next to no electricity bill for the current vendor)
Master bedroom + ensuite + walk in robe
Warm & light filled family living
Plentiful storage in double garage, 3x3m shed, smaller shed, 2x linen cupboards & robes in bedrooms
Formal living & family living zone
Lush manicured gardens with outdoor alfresco entertaining area
Private and secure
Quite court location
Nearby Schooling: Grovedale Primary, Mandama Primary, Deakin University
Nearby Amenities: Coles/IGA/Woolies/ALDI, Pharmacy, Epworth Hospital, Shops, Cafes & Restaurants
Nearby Locations: Waurn Ponds (2 mins), Highton & Belmont (5 mins), Geelong (10 mins) & Torquay (20 mins)
Close to Marshall Station for Melbourne commuters, vast amount of bus routes available and close to Geelong Ring Road entry point.
Rental estimate $460 - $480 per week
This home is the ideal entry, investment or upsize into the Grovedale market.
Insights: 14 Camira Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in a Fantastic Location
The Phone Code for this property is: 77032. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
This imposing 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit, being the front unit of only 2 on the block (so no Body Corporate fees) is situated in an established quiet pocket of Leopold and only a short walk to Gateway Plaza and all it has to offer. Suitable for downsizers, investors or first home buyers, this property is sure to please. Fully renovated just over 3 years ago it offers two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, wall to wall carpet and quality block out and privacy blinds.
The spacious L shaped kitchen, dining and living area features Blackbutt vinyl plank flooring, downlights, block out and privacy blinds together with a Vulcan wall heater and split system air conditioning. The kitchen includes stainless steel gas stove top, with electric oven and range hood a pantry and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
The impressive bathroom features floor to ceiling tiles, dimmable downlights, freestanding bath, corner shower and glass top vanity. The separate toilet and laundry with storage and external access add the final touches to the floorplan.
Off the living area is a sliding door that leads into a private undercover entertainment area with built in water feature and access to the front yard and single lock up garage with remote controlled roller door. The rear of the property has a garden shed, access to the driveway and an unused area that could be used for additional parking, boat/trailer/caravan storage, veggie garden etc.
Close to shops, schools, medical facilities, sporting grounds, public transport and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula this property ticks all the boxes.
Disclaimer:
Whilst every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, For Sale By Owner (forsalebyowner.com.au Pty Ltd) cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective buyers or tenants need to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.
Insights: 1/7 Heytesbury Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 12 other 2 bedroom unit in Leopold have recently been sold.
